text:
In the post listing template is it possible, to tell the loop not to use say...the first 3 of the latest posts.

currently on our blog page we have a latest news module, with it's own loop to get the first 3 posts. then another module, and then the rest of the blog content module.

this obviously then displays all the posts with it's pagination etc. however the first 3 posts are the same 3 in the previous module. I know I could hide the first 3 with CSS, however I'm not really a fan of this as a workaround.
